senses.sense_definition: A medical condition characterized by abnormally high levels of calcium in the urine, often caused by bone resorption issues like osteoporosis or hyperthyroidism.

examples.text: The doctor ordered further tests to determine if the patient was suffering from <w>hypercalcinuria</w>.
Patients diagnosed with severe <w>hypercalcinuria</w> are often advised to modify their diet to prevent kidney stones.
